entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow changing to light snow and local blowing snow this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Light snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Local blowing snow in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
